import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './NavBarV2.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {authService} from '../../tools/fbase' function NavBarV2({history, scrollPosition, isLoggedIn}) { const onLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('name'); localStorage.removeItem('job'); authService.signOut(); alert("로그아웃 되셨습니다."); history.push('/'); history.go(); } return (
Surfee {/* 제품소개 */} 문의하기 {isLoggedIn ? <> onLogout()}> 로그아웃 : <> 로그인 회원가입 }
) } export default NavBarV2
